verdicts.description: List of verdicts for each claim

claim_id.description: UUID of the claim being evaluated

verdict.description: Verdict for the claim: supported (backed by evidence), contradicted (conflicts with evidence), or not_enough_info (cannot be confirmed)

evidence_ids.description: List of evidence IDs (UUIDs) that support this verdict

rationale.description: Brief explanation (1-2 sentences) of why this verdict was given, citing specific evidence
